I miss the good old days...
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): I miss the good old days...
By MrGG on Friday, February 4, 2005 - 07:05 pm:

I remember about this time last year, coming home from a baseball game and going straight to my playstation and MRM chat, we had tournaments running and entries a coming. Then things slowed down and now are at a complete stop.

Maybe by this summer I attempt to get it started again.. Or atleast I hope.

Just had to put this out there.

By John Hawley on Saturday, February 5, 2005 - 05:07 am:

This happens. It's been a while since the last release and is a while until the next release. It will pick back up especially as the summer approaches. People will have more time to play.

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, February 5, 2005 - 10:25 am:
